metadata.name: Anthony Thompson

persona.name: Priya Desai
persona.role: IT Coordinator, multi-site dental practice (4 locations)
persona.goal: Explore Ethernet/dedicated connectivity options and confirm serviceability per address
persona.context: Responsible for network reliability across locations; wants redundancy; needs to verify addresses and get an appointment with a business specialist

intent.name: Change of Address / Move Service
intent.description: An existing customer needs to move service to a new business location; should be qualified and scheduled for a callback.
intent.goal: Capture new address and timeline and schedule a callback to coordinate the move.
intent.initialMessage: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

metadata.outcome: Move-service callback window requested and details for Ethernet/redundancy review specified.

turns.content: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?
We can help get your service moved to the new office. What date, time, and timezone works best for a move appointment?

messages: We can help get your service moved to the new office. What date, time, and timezone works best for a move appointment?

turns.content:
Before we lock in a time, I need to confirm serviceability and options at the new site.  

We’re targeting Friday, March 7th, anytime between 10am–1pm Central, but that’s flexible if you need a specific slot. Also, where do I give you the new address details so you can verify Ethernet/dedicated availability before we commit?
I can check serviceability and Ethernet options for your new office. Please share the full new address so we can verify availability.

messages: I can check serviceability and Ethernet options for your new office. Please share the full new address so we can verify availability.

turns.content:
Sure. Here’s the new primary location:

Northbrook Dental Group – Corporate & Ortho  
1427 W Lake Cook Rd, Suite 210  
Northbrook, IL 60062  

We’re looking specifically for dedicated Ethernet or similar symmetrical options, plus whether a secondary diverse path is possible for redundancy. Can you confirm what’s actually lit in that building and not just “theoretical” availability?

I’ll have our Business Class team verify dedicated Ethernet and any secondary diverse path for 1427 W Lake Cook Rd, Suite 210. Can I schedule a call on Friday, March 7, anytime between 10 am‑1 pm Central to go over the confirmed options?

messages: I’ll have our Business Class team verify dedicated Ethernet and any secondary diverse path for 1427 W Lake Cook Rd, Suite 210. Can I schedule a call on Friday, March 7, anytime between 10 am‑1 pm Central to go over the confirmed options?

turns.content:
Yes, that window works.  

Please book it for Friday, March 7 between 10am–1pm Central, and have them call my direct line at 312-555-9824. I also want them to be prepared with:  
- Whether the building is already lit and on-net  
- Actual committed speeds/SLAs and term options  
- If a physically diverse secondary path is available and what that looks like (separate entrance/fiber, different CO, etc.).  

Can you confirm the appointment is set and that I’ll get a calendar invite to priya.desai@northbrookdentalgroup.com?
